This program is brought to you by Sakura Ishiyama of Juice Juice and Sumire Tashiro of Ocha no Oma.
Juice Story is now on sale!
It's an album that contains 10 years of Juice Juice's history.
It also includes newly arranged versions of some of the songs.
Juice Juice at Budokan will be released on DVD and Blu-ray!
It was a very fun concert!
We hope you can watch it many times on DVD!
Ochanoumi's first album Channel 1 will be released on January 10 next year!
This will be our first album, so please listen to it!
As you can see on the album, this concert will be filled with a lot of history of JuiceJuice.
We will do our best to let many people know more about our history!
On December 21, JuiceJuice Ochanoma will perform at Cho-Idol Fest!
We will be performing at the Omiya Sonic City Grand Hall.
It will be a very fun festival, so we hope you will come and join us!
Hello Project 2024 Winter 3 ofus will start on January 2nd next year!
We will be performing with 3 groups!
Haloste is a channel where Hello Project members will be appearing more and more!
New videos will be uploaded every Wednesday, so please subscribe to the channel!
This time we have Sakura Ishiyama from JuiceJuice and Sumire Tashiro from Ochamama.
